Fee Schedule

Source: vignettes/fee-schedule.Rmd
fee-schedule.Rmd

HCPCS 

search_fee_schedule(
  hcpcs    = "39503", 
  state    = "GA", 
  locality = "99",
  mac      = "10212") |> 
  remove_empty(which = c("rows", "cols")) |>
  rowwise() |>
  mutate(descriptions_clinician = map(
    descriptions_clinician, ~paste0("* ", ., collapse = "\n"))) |>
  unnest(cols = descriptions_clinician) |>
  ungroup() |> 
  case_multproc(mult_proc) |>
  case_global(global) |>
  case_cosurg(surg_co) |>
  case_assistant(surg_asst) |>
  case_status(status) |>
  case_supervision(supvis) |>
  case_bilateral(surg_bilat) |>
  case_team(surg_team) |>
  case_imaging(dximg) |>
  case_pctc(pctc) |>
  case_opps(opps) |>
  case_chapter_cpt(hcpcs) |> 
  case_category(hcpcs) |>
  select("CPT Code" = hcpcs,
         Description = description,
         Consumer = description_consumer,
         Clinician = descriptions_clinician,
         "CPT Chapter" = chapter,
         "Code Range" = range,
         "CPT Category" = category,
         "Fee Schedule Status" = status,
         "RBCS Category" = rbcs_category,
         "RBCS Family" = rbcs_family,
         MAC = mac,
         State = state,
         Locality = locality,
         Area = area,
         Counties = counties,
         "Work GPCI" = wgpci,
         "Practice GPCI" = pgpci,
         "Malpractice GPCI" = mgpci,
         "Work RVU" = wrvu,
         "Non-Facility Practice RVU" = nfprvu,
         "Facility Practice RVU" = fprvu,
         "Malpractice RVU" = mrvu,
         "Conversion Factor" = cf,
         "Total Facility RVUs" = frvus,
         "Total Non-Facility RVUs" = nrvus,
         "Facility PAR Fee" = fpar,
         "Non-Facility PAR Fee" = npar,
         "Facility NON-PAR Fee" = fnpar,
         "Non-Facility NON-PAR Fee" = nfnpar,
         "Facility Limiting Charge" = flim,
         "Non-Facility Limiting Charge" = nlim,
         "Multiple Procedures" = mproc_description,
         # "Global Indicator" = global,
         "Global Days" = global_description,
         "Preoperative" = op_pre,
         "Intraoperative" = op_intra,
         "Postoperative" = op_post,
         "Assistant at Surgery" = asst_description,
         "Co-Surgeons" = cosurg_description,
         "Team Surgery" = team_description,
         ) |>
  display_long() |>
  gt(rowname_col = "name") |>
  tab_row_group(
    label = "Descriptions",
    rows = matches("(Description | Consumer | Clinician)"),
  ) |> 
  gt_style(tablign = "right", tabsize = 14, tabwt = "bold") |> 
  sub_missing(missing_text = "Concept Does Not Apply") |> 
  fmt_markdown() |> 
  tab_style(
      style = cell_text(
      font = google_font(name = "Fira Code")),
      locations = cells_body(columns = contains("value"))) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(
      sides = c("all"),
      color = "powderblue",
      weight = px(3)),
    locations = cells_row_groups()) |>
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_fill(color = "powderblue"),
      cell_text(weight = "bold")
      ),
    locations = cells_row_groups())

CPT Code

39503

Description

Repair of diaphragm hernia

Consumer

Repair of congenital defect of muscle separating chest and abdominal cavities, neonate

Clinician
  • Repair of neonatal diaphragmatic hernia
  • Repair of neonatal diaphragmatic hernia with creation of ventral hernia
  • Repair of neonatal diaphragmatic hernia with insertion of chest tube
  • Repair of neonatal diaphragmatic hernia with insertion of chest tube and creation of ventral hernia

CPT Chapter

Surgery [10004-69990]

Code Range

10004 - 69990

CPT Category

1

Fee Schedule Status

Active

RBCS Category

Major Procedure

RBCS Family

Other Organ Systems

MAC

10212

State

GA

Locality

99

Area

REST OF GEORGIA

Counties

ALL OTHER COUNTIES

Work GPCI

1

Practice GPCI

0.883

Malpractice GPCI

1.125

Work RVU

108.91

Non-Facility Practice RVU

Facility Practice RVU

Malpractice RVU

32.7442

Total Facility RVUs

Total Non-Facility RVUs

170.25737

Facility PAR Fee

5574.941374754

Non-Facility PAR Fee

5574.941374754

Facility NON-PAR Fee

5296.1943060163

Non-Facility NON-PAR Fee

5296.1943060163

Facility Limiting Charge

6090.62345191875

Non-Facility Limiting Charge

6090.62345191875

Multiple Procedures

Standard adjustment. If reported on the same day as another procedure with an indicator of 1, 2, or 3, rank the procedures by fee schedule amount and apply the appropriate reduction to this code (100%, 50%, 50%, 50%, 50% and by report). Base payment on the lower of (a) the actual charge, or (b) the fee schedule amount reduced by the appropriate percentage.

Global Days

Major surgery with a 1-day Preoperative period and 90-day Postoperative period included in fee schedule amount.

Preoperative

0.09

Intraoperative

0.84

Postoperative

0.07

Assistant at Surgery

No Payment Restriction; Assistant can be paid

Co-Surgeons

Medical Necessity Documentation Required

Team Surgery

Not Permitted

ICD-10-CM 

icd10cm(code           = "F50.82") |> 
  select("ICD-10-Code" = code, 
         Description   = description, 
         Section       = section,
         "Ch. No."     = ch,
         Chapter       = chapter, 
         Range         = range, 
         Abbreviation  = abbrev) |> 
  display_long() |>
  gt(rowname_col       = "name") |>
  gt_style(tablign     = "right", 
           tabsize     = 16, 
           tabwt       = "bold")
ICD-10-Code F50.82
Description Avoidant/restrictive food intake disorder
Section Eating disorders
Ch. No. 5
Chapter Mental, behavioral and neurodevelopmental disorders
Range F01 - F99
Abbreviation PSYCH
